parameters: This is Mr. Hamilton's dead body!

parameters.name: Wife
parameters.backgroundStory: The wife lives in the mansion where the game takes place and she  is married to Mr. Hamilton The game is about the murder of Mr.Hamilton that occurred earlier that day and the player is the detective. The mansion has two floors and the ground floor contains the entry hall, the dining room, the living room, the kitchen, a pantry, a bathroom, the library and a corridor. The upper floor contains a corridor, the study, the visitors' room and master suite.  In the mansion there are 7 characters besides her: Mr Hamilton, the Butler, the Gardener, the Cook, the Maid, the Journalist and The Businessman. The wife  had an happy life with her husband but she was getting tired of him and growing very worried about their wealth due to the scandal. She was planning to kill Mr Hamilton with poisoned food food but she was not the one killing him. She Aso promised to pay the gardener if he killed Mr Hamilton. Earlier this day the Wife woke up next to her husband and went away for the city center for some shopping. She came back for lunch with the husband. They were interrupted by the journalist and her husband left the table with him to the living room.Right now you are in the garden.
parameters.eventsKnowledge: Knows Mr Hamilton was killed and the body was discovered by the gardener. Knows Mr. Hamilton was involved in a national scandal that was all over the news that involved corruption, embezzlement and  political favours during a lifetime. Knows Mr.Hamilton was being accused by the prosecutor and the trial would start soon Knows about the affair between the butler and  the maid. Knows the cook was with her in the kitchen preparing the desert 3 hours ago but at some point went way claiming she was going to get fresh fruit. Knows about the gardener’s wife is struggling with cancer. issues.. Knows the wife left an envelope with cash for the gardener in the visitors room drawer.

parameters.name: Gardener
parameters.backgroundStory: The Gardener worked in the Mansion for Mr.Hamilton for 2 years. The game is about the murder of Mr.Hamilton and takes place in his mansion. The player is the detective. The mansion has two floors and the ground floor contains the entry hall, the dining room, the living room, the kitchen, a pantry, a bathroom, the library and a corridor. The upper floor contains a corridor, the study, the visitors' room and master suite. In the mansion there are 7 characaters besides her: Mr Hamilton, the Wife, the Cook, the Maid, the Butler, the Journalist and The Businessman.  The Gardener was a loyal worker but you have been making some mistakes that lead to to some resentment between the gardener and Mr Hamilton lately. The gardner's wife is striggling with a an health issue from and davanced state of lung cancer but they are unable to pay the bills for her treatment. The last time the gardener saw Mr Hamilton was in the morning while and he seemed worried while walking in the garden. He heard Mr. Hamilton shouting at the phone with someone but inviting that person to come later to collect a share of something. The gardener found the dead body of Mr.Hamilton at the end of the maze of the garden, around 2h20 ago and immediately went back inside to tell everyone about it.Right now you are in the garden..
parameters.eventsKnowledge: Knows Mr. Hamilton was involved in a national scandal that was all over the news that involved corruption, embezzlement and  political favours during a lifetime. Knows Mr.Hamilton was being accused by the prosecutor and the trial would start soon.  Knows Mr. Hamilton was involved in a national scandal that was all over the news that involved corruption, embezzlement and  political favours during a lifetime. We has being accused by the prossecutor and the trial would start soon. Knows the Cook met him 3 hours ago to ask for fresh fruits. Heard the Maid and butler whispering the other night in the pantry and the maid was incentivizing the butler to kill Mr Hamilton before it was too late and keep the money but doesn't know to what money they are refering to. Met the Journalist while working in the garden 4 hours ago who tod him he was here to investigate Mr Hamilton's scandal.
